mph.beans.sessions

Interface UserRegisteringFunctionalities

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AdministratorManagerRemote, StudentManagerRemote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdministratorManager, StudentManager

    interface UserRegisteringFunctionalities
    This interface provides methods for the users to register to the MPH system.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void registerNewUser(java.lang.String theUsername, PasswordHashDTO thePasswordHash, java.lang.String theFirstName, java.lang.String theLastName, java.sql.Date theBirthday, java.lang.String theEmail, java.lang.String theTelephoneNumber)
      Register a new user with the given arguments

    • Method Detail

      • registerNewUser

        void registerNewUser(java.lang.String theUsername,
                   PasswordHashDTO thePasswordHash,
                   java.lang.String theFirstName,
                   java.lang.String theLastName,
                   java.sql.Date theBirthday,
                   java.lang.String theEmail,
                   java.lang.String theTelephoneNumber)
                     throws UsernameAlreadyExistsException,
                            InvalidArgumentException
        Register a new user with the given arguments
        Parameters:
        theUsername - the chosen username
        thePasswordHash - the hash of the chosen password
        theFirstName - the user first name
        theLastName - the user last name
        theBirthday - the user birthday
        theEmail - the user email
        theTelephoneNumber - the user telephone number
        Throws:
        UsernameAlreadyExistsException - if the username given as parameter already exists in the database
        InvalidArgumentException - if one of the arguments is not valid
